com.microsoft.cognitiveservices.speechrecognition

Interface ISpeechRecognitionServerEvents


  • public interface ISpeechRecognitionServerEvents
    Handles callbacks for Speech related events

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onAudioEvent(boolean recording)
      Invoked when the audio recording state has changed.
      void onError(int errorCode, java.lang.String response)
      Invoked when an error is detected
      void onFinalResponseReceived(RecognitionResult response)
      In ShortPhrase mode, the client gets one final multiple n-best choice result when recognition is complete.
      void onIntentReceived(java.lang.String payload)
      Invoked when an intent parsing is received.
      void onPartialResponseReceived(java.lang.String response)
      Invoked when during the recognition process, the Speech Recognition server can create a hypothesis on what the recognized text might be.

    • Method Detail

      • onPartialResponseReceived

        void onPartialResponseReceived(java.lang.String response)
        Invoked when during the recognition process, the Speech Recognition server can create a hypothesis on what the recognized text might be. As more audio streams in, the hypothesis might change, and get longer as well. So with each hypothesis, the server will call back and this event will be fired and contain the current hypothesis text.
        Parameters:
        response - The display text

      • onFinalResponseReceived

        void onFinalResponseReceived(RecognitionResult response)
        In ShortPhrase mode, the client gets one final multiple n-best choice result when recognition is complete. This event will be fired for that one final multiple n-best choice result.

        In LongDictation mode, the client will receive multiple final results, based on where the server thinks sentence pauses are. This event will be fired for each final result, as the server determines them.

        Parameters:
        response - A StreamlinedRecognitionResults which contains the n-best recognized text results and their confidences. A StreamlinedRecognitionResults can then further be used to obtain a SpeechRecognitionResults which has even more n-best result data.

      • onIntentReceived

        void onIntentReceived(java.lang.String payload)
        Invoked when an intent parsing is received.

      • onError

        void onError(int errorCode,
           java.lang.String response)
        Invoked when an error is detected
        Parameters:
        errorCode - The error code.
        response - The body of the http response for the error.

      • onAudioEvent

        void onAudioEvent(boolean recording)
        Invoked when the audio recording state has changed.
        Parameters:
        recording - The current recording state
